parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the returned page. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: **50**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the VPC to which the route table belongs.

You can call [DescribeRegions](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/vpc/developer-reference/api-vpc-2016-04-28-describeregions) to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the route table belongs.

parameters.name: RouteTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the route table.

parameters.name: RouteTableName
parameters.description: The name of the route table.

parameters.name: RouteTableType
parameters.description:
The type of the route table.

*   **System**
*   **Custom**

parameters.name: RouterId
parameters.description: The ID of vRouter to which the route table belongs.

parameters.name: RouterType
parameters.description:
The type of the router to which the route table belongs. Valid value:

*   **VRouter** (default): a vRouter
*   **VBR**: a VBR

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description:
The ID of the VPC to which the route table belongs. 

When this parameter is set, the value of **RouterType** is automatically assigned to **VRouter**.
